AttributeMetaData.name: ADTTOTAL
AttributeMetaData.command:
SELECT concat(BRKEY, Bridge_ID) AS UniqueIdentifier,
      CAST(INSPDATE AS
      DATETIME) AS
      DateTime,
      CAST(REPLACE(ADTTOTAL,
      ',',
      '') AS
      float) AS
      Value FROM
      dbo.PennDot_Report_A WHERE
      (ISNUMERIC(ADTTOTAL) =
      1)

AttributeMetaData.name: COUNTY
AttributeMetaData.command: SELECT concat(BRKEY, Bridge_ID) AS UniqueIdentifier, CAST(INSPDATE AS DATETIME) AS DateTime, CAST(COUNTY AS varchar(50)) AS Value FROM dbo.PennDot_Report_A
